Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Not all teachers will provide feedback prior to submission. And when they do, it is at a time which suits them (which is so fair). However, GenAI can give feedback at quite literally any time. The instant access to feedback is very helpful.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI is very objective and as thorough as you want it to be. In person feedback can be a bit of a hit or a miss.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
